`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(a.pre,{children:(0,i.jsxDEV)(a.code,{className:"language-js",children:`/**\r
 * Definition for a binary tree node.\r
 * function TreeNode(val, left, right) {\r
 *     this.val = (val===undefined ? 0 : val)\r
 *     this.left = (left===undefined ? null : left)\r
 *     this.right = (right===undefined ? null : right)\r
 * }\r
 */\r
/**\r
 * @param {TreeNode} root\r
 * @param {number} low\r
 * @param {number} high\r
 * @return {number}\r
 */\r
var rangeSumBST = function (root, low, high) {\r
  let sum = 0;\r
  if (root === null) return sum;\r
  if (root.val > low) {\r
    sum += rangeSumBST(root.left, low, high);\r
  }\r
  if (root.val < high) {\r
    sum += rangeSumBST(root.right, low, high);\r
  }\r
  if (root.val >= low && root.val <= high) {\r
    sum += root.val;\r
  }\r
  return sum;\r
};
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\SSAFY\\haeun\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-f8ca4722-c1f9-4b25-a7a1-7e6fbb208f6d.mdx",lineNumber:55,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\SSAFY\\haeun\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-f8ca4722-c1f9-4b25-a7a1-7e6fbb208f6d.mdx",lineNumber:55,columnNumber:1},this),`
